title: FS: Pair of N28 Allen and Gingers
author: chlankf

posts.post_title: FS: Pair of N28 Allen and Gingers
posts.post_content:
Here is a great pair of raw brilliant white N28s.  I've had these beauties tucked away since I picked them up at Nationals in '93.

R. L. Caruthers $old
Joseph Mulvey $275

USPS padded with tracking included.
